Condition_summary_1: Sedimentation and erosion control measures must be in place and maintained to avoid sediment release into the watercourse.
Condition_summary_2: Total suspended sediment and turbidity monitoring must adhere to the plan in Appendix C of the 2018 Aquatic Effects Assessment.
Condition_summary_3: All riprap must be clean and free of fine materials, not obtained from fish-frequented waters.
Condition_summary_4: Contingency measures include upgrading erosion controls, increasing berm height, and halting work if turbidity thresholds are met.
Fish_species: None explicitly listed in the document
Boulder: Large boulders are to be stockpiled and replaced as part of natural structures preservation.
Woody_coverage: Woody debris is to be stockpiled and replaced as part of natural structures preservation.
Instream_structures: Secondary channel re-graded to increase connectivity during low flow conditions.
